attributes.title: Volume 1
attributes.caption: 15-year-old Ruby Rose has just been accepted to Beacon academy. If she wants to graduate, she'll have to work together with with Weiss Schnee, Blake Belladonna, and Yang Xiao Long, both on the battlefield and in the classroom.
attributes.description: A young hero, an exalted heiress, a troubled rogue, and a party girl- These are the four members of RWBY, a team brought together and trained for the sole purpose of combating the rampant evils that plague the fantastic world of Remnant. If these four girls want to graduate Beacon Academy they'll have to learn to work together both on the battlefield and in the classroom.

attributes.title: Volume 2
attributes.caption: Team RWBY is back and ready for their second semester at Beacon, but real life doesn't stop there.
attributes.description: Team RWBY is back and ready for their second semester at Beacon, but real life doesn't stop there. Between classes and homework, they still have to find time to save the world. And between the White Fang, Roman Torchwick, and a mysterious new trio, they certainly have their work cut out for them!

attributes.title: Volume 3 - Part 1
attributes.caption: The Vytal Festival Tournament is the ultimate battle of skill, pitting the world's most powerful Huntsmen and Huntresses in training against one another... and it's finally here!
attributes.description: The Vytal Festival Tournament is the ultimate battle of skill, pitting the world's most powerful Huntsmen and Huntresses in training against one another... and it's finally here! Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang are back for a season of over-the-top action, and they're not alone. New fighters from around Remnant are ready to bring glory to their kingdom, but there are those among them with a far more sinister goal in mind.

attributes.title: Volume 3 - Part 2
attributes.caption: The Vytal Tournament is in full-swing and Team RWBY is not alone. Newcomers have really begun to shake things up as the shape-shifting arena pushes everyone to their limits.
attributes.description: The Vytal Tournament is in full-swing and Team RWBY is not alone. Newcomers have really begun to shake things up as the shape-shifting arena pushes everyone to their limits. Will Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang make it to the grand finales? And what do Cinder and her crew of evil-doers have in-store for Beacon Academy?

attributes.title: Volume 4 - Part 1
attributes.caption: It's been several months since the Fall of Beacon, and the world of Remnant is still recovering. Tensions are high, lives have been lost, and the members of Team RWBY... are divided.
attributes.description: It's been several months since the Fall of Beacon, and the world of Remnant is still recovering. Tensions are high, lives have been lost, and the members of Team RWBY... are divided. Each of our heroines now faces a journey of their own.

attributes.title: Volume 4 - Part 2
attributes.caption: While some students must search inward if they ever hope to move on, others will venture out into the world in search of answers.
attributes.description: While some students must search inward if they ever hope to move on, others will venture out into the world in search of answers. Alongside the remaining members of Team JNPR, Ruby Rose has begun the long trek to the kingdom of Mistral, but the road ahead is full of surprises. New friends and enemies await, while the threat of an even larger catastrophe draws near.

attributes.title: Volume 5 - Part 1
attributes.caption: Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang are each entangled in journeys of their own, but they all share one destination: Haven Academy.
attributes.description: Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang are each entangled in journeys of their own, but they all share one destination: Haven Academy.

attributes.title: Volume 5 - Part 2
attributes.caption: Whether it's the promise of ancient relics, mystical maidens, or simply more power, it's clear that the stage for the next great battle for Remnant has been chosen.
attributes.description: Whether it's the promise of ancient relics, mystical maidens, or simply more power, it's clear that the stage for the next great battle for Remnant has been chosen. The question is, with so many players in this game, who's going to come out on top?
